body_html:
Empty tensor isn't in 0.4.1, but is enabled on master. And running on master gives correct results. :)

│In [1]: import torch
│
│In [2]: a = torch.Tensor([1,2,3])
│
│In [3]: a.narrow(0,0,1)
│Out[3]: tensor([1.])
│
│In [4]: a.narrow(0,0,0)
│Out[4]: tensor([])
│
│In [5]: a.narrow(0,0,0).shape
│Out[5]: torch.Size([0])

body:
Empty tensor isn't in 0.4.1, but is enabled on master. And running on master gives correct results. :) 
```py
│In [1]: import torch
│
│In [2]: a = torch.Tensor([1,2,3])
│
│In [3]: a.narrow(0,0,1)
│Out[3]: tensor([1.])
│
│In [4]: a.narrow(0,0,0)
│Out[4]: tensor([])
│
│In [5]: a.narrow(0,0,0).shape
│Out[5]: torch.Size([0])

```
